name: Faint | Fun Mobile Game! (Android APK)
description:
Faint is a fun infinite runner about a drunk dude who took the phrase, "Fuck the police!" to heart. Play through a infinite game, where you collect bottles to earn upgrades! It's in fact, a very fun time, for the whole family. Get together and play together!

All that aside. This is the child born from a legendary collaboration between:
Pancakeey - https://pancakeey.itch.io/
tacecapS - https://tacecaps.itch.io/
slayervictor - https://slayervictor.itch.io/

This collab took place in a small house, where three drunken developers had a good time-- not like that! Faint is the product of that collab. 

We are trying to reach a Donation Goal of 25$, because we want to be able to upload the game on Google Play Store. We have reached 0$ of 25$. 

Take pride in playing this amazing game, also.. SHARE with your friends!
Thanks for reading this mess of a description! Byee!
